svg.text: title: "August 9, 2018" date: "2018-08-09"

available for preorder , to ship mid-Sept

* ENS partnership with MMX to make .luxe the first TLD with DNS and ENS support . How
ENS uses the DNSSEC chain of trust for claiming your DNS via ENS. And get a bounty
from Gitcoin for integrating ENS into your dapp’s architecture

DAC, both funded by the Aragon Foundation.

If you appreciate this newsletter, thank ConsenSys
This newsletter is made possible by ConsenSys , which is perpetually hiring if you’re
interested.
Editorial control is 100% me. If you’re unhappy with editorial decisions, feel free to
tweet at me.
Shameless self-promotion
Most of what I link to I tweet first: @evan_van_ness
Week in Ethereum News
